title: CMD Kerala Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 17 Office Attendant and Other Posts
description: The Center of Management Development (CMD Kerala) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 17 Urban Designers, Architects, Project Executive, Project Engineer, Site Engineer, and Office Attendant Jobs. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Civil, Mechanical, Electrical Engineer, MBA, 10th pass can apply for the CMD Kerala Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, select...
